content: Create PDF forms in {{productName}}, e.g. in your {{sectionName}}, and upload the ready ones to the room. Make use of the integrated template library and choose among numerous ready PDF templates.

comment.text: Create a PDF form in {{productName}}, and upload ready templates from the integrated template library. This instruction is displayed in a guidance component for users to fill out forms.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Azerbaijani translation uses a colon (:) after 'sectionName' which is unusual in Azerbaijani sentence structure and creates a slightly awkward read. It would be more natural to omit it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the colon after {{sectionName}}.  Change '{{sectionName}} bölməsində:' to '{{sectionName}} bölməsində'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'otağa yükləyin' is a valid translation for 'upload to the room', a more natural and commonly used term in this context would be 'yükləyin'. The current phrasing sounds a bit too literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change 'otağa yükləyin' to 'yükləyin'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Greek translation uses a space before the colon in "στο {{productName}}". This space is unnecessary and breaks the flow of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the space before the colon: στο {{productName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Similar issue with a space before the colon in "στο {{sectionName}}".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the space before the colon: στο {{sectionName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ready ones' is not accurately translated. 'listos' implies 'ready' but lacks the specific context of PDF forms. A more accurate translation would better convey the meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cree formularios PDF en {{productName}}, por ejemplo, en sus {{sectionName}}, y cargue los formularios PDF terminados en la sala.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'listas para usar' is a literal translation of 'ready to use'. While understandable, it's not the most natural phrasing in Spanish. A more fluent expression would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cree formularios PDF en {{productName}}, por ejemplo, en sus {{sectionName}}, y cargue los formularios PDF terminados en la sala. Haga uso de la biblioteca integrada de plantillas y elija entre numerosas plantillas PDF.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "huoneeseen" (to the room) is a bit ambiguous in this context. It's unclear which room is being referred to. This might be confusing for users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider clarifying which room the PDF forms are being uploaded to, e.g., 'työtilaan' (to the workspace) or another more specific term.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ready ones' is awkwardly translated as 'les formulaires prêts'. A more natural and accurate translation would be 'les formulaires prêts à l'emploi' or 'les formulaires prêts'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: les formulaires prêts à l'emploi

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "վերբեռնեք պատրաստի ձևերը սենյակ" is awkward. 'Room' in this context likely refers to a specific platform or digital space, not a physical room. A more accurate translation would convey this.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: վերբեռնեք պատրաստի ձևերը հարթակում (or the specific platform name if known).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The punctuation and sentence structure in the last part of the translation could be improved for better flow. While grammatically correct, it reads slightly choppy.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Օգտվեք ներկառուցված կաղապարների գրադարանից և ընտրեք բազմաթիվ պատրաստի PDF կաղապարներ։ Բացի այդ, կարող եք ընտրել պատրաստի PDF կաղապարներից։

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Japanese translation uses the standard sentence structure. Consider adding a slightly more natural flow by rephrasing. The sentence '統合されたテンプレートライブラリを利用し、多数の準備されたPDFテンプレートの中から選択してください' feels a bit stiff.  While technically correct, a more natural phrasing might be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 統合されたテンプレートライブラリを利用して、豊富なPDFテンプレートの中からお好きなものをお選びください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "완성된 양식을 채팅방에 업로드하세요" could be slightly smoother. The word '채팅방에' (to the chat room) feels a little abrupt. While technically correct, a more natural flow might be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 완성된 양식을 방에 업로드하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ຕົວຢ່າງເຊັ່ນ ຢູ່ພາກສ່ວນ {{sectionName}} ຂອງເຈົ້າ" is a slightly awkward translation of "e.g. in your {{sectionName}}". It implies ownership rather than a general location. A more accurate translation would reflect that the section is *within* the user's context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຕົວຢ່າງເຊັ່ນ ພາຍໃນພາກສ່ວນ {{sectionName}} ຂອງເຈົ້າ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation uses "ຫໍສະໝຸດແມ່ແບບແບບສຳເລັດຮູບ" for "integrated template library". While technically correct, it's a bit long and complex. Consider a more concise option.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຫໍແມ່ແບບສຳເລັດຮູບ (or just ແມ່ແບບສຳເລັດຮູບ)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'envie' (send) is directly attached to 'prontos' (ready ones) which can sound a bit awkward in Portuguese. A better flow would be to separate them with a preposition.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Crie formulários PDF no {{productName}}, por exemplo na sua {{sectionName}}, e carregue os prontos para a sala. Utilize a biblioteca de modelos integrada e escolha entre diversos modelos PDF prontos.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Make use of' is overly literal and doesn't flow naturally in Portuguese. It can be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Utilize a biblioteca de modelos integrada

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “Numerous” translates to “vários” which is acceptable, but 'countless' or 'inúmeros' might better convey the intended richness of the template library.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Utilize a biblioteca de modelos integrada e escolha entre inúmeros modelos PDF prontos.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'în sală' (in the room) is an awkward translation of 'to the room'. It doesn't quite convey the intended meaning of uploading to a specific area or platform.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more appropriate translation like 'în platformă' (to the platform), 'în spațiul de lucru' (to the workspace), or 'la încărcare' (for uploading).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'disponibile' is used instead of 'ready'. While 'disponibile' means 'available', 'ready' better captures the meaning of completed templates.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'disponibile' with 'gata' or 'pregătite'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ready ones" is awkwardly translated. While 'sūdadanim vuva' is literal, it doesn't flow naturally in Sinhala. It's unclear what 'ones' refers to.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like 'සාදාගත් PDF ආකෘති' (saadagaath PDF aakruthika) which translates to 'created PDF forms'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the original English uses double curly braces for variables, the Sinhala translation only uses single curly braces for {{productName}} and {{sectionName}}. This inconsistency might be confusing for developers/editors.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Maintain consistency with double curly braces: {{productName}} and {{sectionName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'ඒකාබද්ධ අච්චු පුස්තකාලය භාවිතා කරනු ලබන අතර බොහෝ සූදානම් PDF අච්චු වලින් තෝරා ගන්න' is grammatically correct but could be more fluid. The 'අතර' (atar - and) feels slightly forced.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing as 'ඒකාබද්ධ අච්චු පුස්තකාලය භාවිතා කරමින් බොහෝ සූදානම් PDF අච්චු වලින් තෝරා ගන්න' (Using the integrated template library, choose from many ready PDF templates).  This uses a participle to connect the two clauses more smoothly.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovenian translation uses a parenthesis after 'productName' and 'sectionName' instead of curly braces. This deviates from the English content's use of curly braces for variable placeholders.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change '(npr. v vašem {{sectionName}})' to '(npr. v vašem {{sectionName}})' and '(npr. v vašem {{sectionName}})' to '(npr. v vašem {{sectionName}})'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'končne' implies 'final' or 'finished'. While accurate, it might be more natural to use a word that implies 'ready-made' or 'prepared' in the context of uploading forms. The focus is on the form's readiness for uploading, not necessarily its finality.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'končne' with a more appropriate word like 'pripravljene' or 'narejene' which emphasize the form being ready for upload.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation retains the English placeholders {{productName}} and {{sectionName}}. While technically correct, it's preferable to localize these if possible for a more natural feel. Assuming these are meant to be replaced with localized versions, this should be noted for translators.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider localizing {{productName}} and {{sectionName}} with Serbian equivalents if possible. Example: 'Креирајте PDF формуларе у [Локализовано Име Продукта], нпр. у вашим [Локализовано Име Секције]...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of '...' in the Turkish translation appears inconsistent with the English, which uses 'e.g.'. While 'örneğin' is correct, the overall flow could be improved for a more natural feel.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like: '{{productName}} içinde, örneğin {{sectionName}} bölümünüzde PDF formları oluşturun...' or '{{productName}}'de, {{sectionName}} gibi bir bölümünde PDF formları oluşturun...'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'odaya yükleyin' (upload to the room) is a direct translation, but it might not be the clearest or most common phrasing for uploading files in a Turkish context. It's unclear what 'room' refers to.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more general term like 'yükleyin' (upload) or a more specific term depending on the context, like 'platforma yükleyin' (upload to the platform) if applicable.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'у кімнату' (into the room) is slightly awkward in this context. It implies a physical room, which might not be the intended meaning. It's likely referring to a digital space or platform.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: у платформу (into the platform) or у простір (into the space)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not entirely wrong, 'готові' (ready) is used repeatedly. A more nuanced translation might be preferable to avoid repetition and provide a better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: заповнені (filled) or створені (created)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Vietnamese translation uses a space before "trong" which is unconventional and could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tạo biểu mẫu PDF trong {{productName}}, ví dụ: trong mục {{sectionName}} của bạn và tải lên các biểu mẫu đã hoàn thành vào phòng. Sử dụng thư viện mẫu tích hợp và chọn từ nhiều mẫu PDF có sẵn.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "制作好的表单" (zhizuò hǎo de biǎofáng) is a bit awkward. It literally translates to 'made-ready forms'. A more natural phrasing would be '已制作好的表单' or '已完成的表单'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 将“制作好的表单”改为“已制作好的表单”或“已完成的表单”

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the phrasing "房间" is a little ambiguous. It could refer to a physical room or a virtual space. Consider clarifying if context allows.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing "上传到房间" based on context. If it's a virtual room, consider "上传到平台/空间".
